metadata.title: CVE-2016-3900 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: cmds/servicemanager/service_manager.c in ServiceManager in Android 5.0.xbefore 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, 6.x before 2016-10-01, and 7.0 before2016-10-01 does not properly restrict service registration, which allowsattackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka internal bug29431260.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
